divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my back porch letting the dog go out for the night as I looked to the southwest above the horizon I saw this strange light Stationary and stable about a fist height from the SW horizon) flashing slowly from the left to the right probable Saturn shaped. I called my wife Kristi to come and see this object and she did and saw the same thing I saw. I rushed back to get the camera and install film and when I got back to the porch it vanished!this direction was toward Stephenville Texas. My wife said the object seem to like implode on itself and there was a light aircraft moving beyond it. about 3 minutes later 7 military jets circled the area and left to go back to the NE. Please contact me so I can meet with an investigator to discuss this phenomenon
Summary: Orange w/ intermitent lights flashing form left to right
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 6 other sightings in Stephenville on or around October 23rd 2008
